description: A mid-size family company in tourism indusrty, tasks are varied from marketing, sales, product concpet prototyping for international export. The highligh of the expereince is leading the whole company data solution, from data collection, intergration, visulization to analysis.

工作描述: 鉴于中型旅游企业的行业特色，此项工作涵盖内容丰富，主要包括市场营销策划、销售及针对亚洲市场的产品理念设计。此履历的亮点为主导全公司的大数据项目，从数据收集、系统融合、数据交互可视化到大数据分析的各项工作。
